description: Free the specified clump velocities. As a result, clump motion reflects the forces acting upon them (velocities are updated during cycling according to equations of motion).

keywords.name: velocity
keywords.description: Free all components of translational velocity

keywords.name: velocity-z
keywords.description: Free z-component of translational velocity (3D only)

keywords.name: spin
keywords.description: Free all components of angular velocity

keywords.name: spin-x
keywords.description: Free x-component of angular velocity (3D only)

keywords.name: spin-y
keywords.description: Free y-component of angular velocity (3D only)

keywords.name: spin-z
keywords.description: Free z-component of angular velocity (3D only)

notes: Multiple velocity components can be freed simultaneously
Freed velocities are updated during cycling according to forces acting on clumps
This command reverses the effect of clump fix command

examples.description: Free all translational and angular velocity components for all clumps
Free x-velocity for clumps in 'left_clumps' group
Free z-velocity for clumps in z-position range (allow vertical motion)
Free all translational velocities for clumps 1-100

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Clump.set_fix(component, False) where component: 0=X, 1=Y, 2=Z, 3=RX, 4=RY, 5=RZ - requires iteration: for c in itasca.clump.list(): c.set_fix(component, False)
